ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer

Class ClusteringBalancer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.ClusteringBalancer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the item stored in the set
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ClusteringBalancer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Ensures a balanced clustering of the two sets passed to the constructor.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Estimates the number of remaining needed cluster cycles to reduce the set corresponding to the passed list to size == 1 based on the size reduction of the previous cycles.

      • ClusteringBalancer

        public ClusteringBalancer(IClusterSet<T> setA,
                  IClusterSet<T> setB)
        Creates a new ClusteringBalancer for the passed sets.
        Parameters:
        setA - one of the sets to cluster
        setB - the other set to cluster

    • Method Detail

      • updateSizeLists

        private void updateSizeLists()
        Adds the current size of the open sets to the length lists.

      • getProjectedNumberOfRemainigCycles

        private long getProjectedNumberOfRemainigCycles(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> lengthList)
        Estimates the number of remaining needed cluster cycles to reduce the set corresponding to the passed list to size == 1 based on the size reduction of the previous cycles.
        Parameters:
        lengthList - the list with all size changes per cycle for a corresponding open nodes set.
        Returns:
        an estimate of the remaining needed cycles.

      • getNextClusterSet

        public IClusterSet<T> getNextClusterSet()
        Gets one of the two sets passed to the constructor that should be clustered next, in order to ensure a balanced clustering progress of both sets / trees.
        Returns:
        the set that should be cluster next or null if both sets have size <= 1.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
